oneOf.title: Credit Transfer
oneOf.description: Sender initiated bank or wire transfer.

oneOf.title: Debit Transfer
oneOf.description: Receiver initiated bank or wire transfer.

oneOf.title: Direct Debit
oneOf.description: Direct debit from the customers bank account.

oneOf.title: Netting
oneOf.description: Intercompany clearing or clearing between partners.

oneOf.title: Other
oneOf.description: Other or mutually defined means of payment.

MeansKey.title: Means Key
MeansKey.description:
MeansKey is a pre-defined payment means key, such as "card" or "cash"
which can be used to describe how a payment was or will be made.

The keys are based on a subset of the UNTDID 4461 code list and simplified
to cover most use cases. Structures that use the MeansKey type should also
include a cbc.Code field to allow for custom or more precise codes to be
used according to the tax regime or pre-arranged agreement between parties.
